note: Manually created minimal guide for bootstrapping E5 experiments

ontology_overview.name: UniProt Core Ontology
ontology_overview.purpose: Defines the schema for UniProt protein knowledge base, including classes for proteins, genes, organisms, annotations, and their relationships

classes.name: Taxon
classes.description: An element of a taxonomy for classifying life forms

classes.name: Annotation
classes.description: Description of a resource on a specific topic

classes.name: Citation
classes.description: Description of a publication from which data was obtained

classes.name: Database
classes.description: Metadata for a life science database

object_properties.name: organism
object_properties.description: Connects a Protein to its Taxon (organism)

query_patterns.name: Find Proteins
query_patterns.sparql_template: SELECT ?protein ?name WHERE { ?protein a up:Protein ; up:mnemonic ?name } LIMIT 10

query_patterns.name: Protein-Organism Relationship
query_patterns.sparql_template: SELECT ?protein ?organism WHERE { ?protein a up:Protein ; up:organism ?organism } LIMIT 10
query_patterns.use_case: Understand which organisms proteins come from
